abstract: Microsoft has yet to persuade Yahoo to agree to a friendly takeover, but the software company is already hiring lobbyists to help it persuade regulators to let the deal go through, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has yet to persuade Yahoo to agree to a friendly takeover, but the software company is already hiring lobbyists to help it persuade regulators to let the deal go through, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Microsoft Hires Firm to Lobby for Yahoo Deal
